name: Polygon Duelist
description:
A multiplayer game that works! A first for me! Thanks for playing!

Polygon Duelist is a minimalistic fighting game with multiple characters, featuring LAN and internet multiplayer! Basic for now, may add more later.

HOW TO PLAY:

Internet - you will need port forwarding set up, others can join through public ip address.

LAN - others can join through your INTERNAL ip address.
